name: VirnetX Holding Corporation
description: VirnetX Holding Corporation is a technology company specializing in secure communication and privacy solutions. Founded in 2005 and headquartered in Zephyr Cove, Nevada, VirnetX has developed a portfolio of patented technologies that enable secure communications over the Internet, including secure domain names and secure real-time communications. The company's flagship products include the Gabriel Connection Technology, which provides a secure framework for communications across various platforms and devices, ensuring data privacy and security. VirnetX has been at the forefront of innovations in the field of cybersecurity, particularly in areas such as Virtual Private Networks (VPNs) and secure video conferencing solutions. The company has also engaged in extensive litigation to protect its intellectual property, achieving notable legal victories against major technology firms. With a focus on enhancing user privacy and securing digital communications, VirnetX aims to provide solutions that meet the growing demand for protection against cyber threats and data breaches. The company's mission is to create a safer online environment through innovative technologies that empower individuals and organizations to communicate securely.
